actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that child's insurance benefits may not be paid to a stepchild on the basis of an insured individual's wage record for any period in which such individual neither has custody of the child nor is responsible for his or her support.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to prohibit the payment of child's insurance benefits to an insured individual's stepchild or stepgrandchild for any month during which such individual has neither legal custody of such child nor legal responsibility for such child's support.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that child's insurance benefits may not be paid to a stepchild on the basis of an insured individual's wage record for any period in which such individual neither has custody of the child nor is responsible for his or her support.
